name: Puncture
description:
@AergiaGame - aergia.dk - itch profile
Press Tab or click the glyph to change between realities in some of the passages.

An interactive story experiment with two-dimensional choices made for the WAG Challenge game jam.

I had to cut some branches off the story near the deadline. And I didn't really want to make a horror game, but it sort of turned out that way in the end (no gore or jump scares or anything, I promise).

Press Escape (Back on Android) to return to the menu and restart.

Made in Twine and Unity with my own parser.

Designed to be easy to play on a phone/tablet.

The music is "Free" by Andreas Busk
